document.topic_text: Switzerland: Jaafari accuses Israel of cooperating with 'terrorist groups' in Golan Heights The Head of the Syrian government delegation at the Intra-Syrian talks, Bashar Jaafari, accused Israel of cooperating with terrorist groups in the Golan Heights region, while holding a press conference in Geneva on Monday. Speaking to the press after his meeting with UN Special envoy Staffan de... You Might Like
